me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc

Class NPC.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.NPC.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    NPC

    public static class NPC.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(NPCProfile profile)
      Deprecated. 
      Use NPC.builder() instead

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NPC build(NPCPool pool)
      Passes the NPC to a pool which handles events, spawning and destruction of this NPC for players
      NPC.Builder imitatePlayer(boolean imitatePlayer)
      Enables/disables imitation of the player, such as sneaking and hitting the player, default is true
      NPC.Builder location(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Sets the location of the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc, cannot be changed afterwards
      NPC.Builder lookAtPlayer(boolean lookAtPlayer)
      Enables/disables looking at the player, default is true
      NPC.Builder profile(NPCProfile profile)
      Sets the NPCProfile of the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc, cannot be changed afterwards
      NPC.Builder spawnCustomizer(SpawnCustomizer spawnCustomizer)
      Sets an executor which will be called every time the NPC is spawned for a certain player.

        @Deprecated
public Builder(NPCProfile profile)
        Deprecated. Use NPC.builder() instead
        Creates a new instance of the NPC builder
        Parameters:
        profile - a player NPCProfile defining UUID, name and textures of the NPC

        public NPC.Builder profile(NPCProfile profile)
        Sets the NPCProfile of the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc, cannot be changed afterwards
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this builder instance

        Sets the location of the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc, cannot be changed afterwards

        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • lookAtPlayer

        public NPC.Builder lookAtPlayer(boolean lookAtPlayer)
        Enables/disables looking at the player, default is true
        Parameters:
        lookAtPlayer - if the NPC should look at the player
        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • imitatePlayer

        public NPC.Builder imitatePlayer(boolean imitatePlayer)
        Enables/disables imitation of the player, such as sneaking and hitting the player, default is true
        Parameters:
        imitatePlayer - if the NPC should imitate players
        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • spawnCustomizer

        public NPC.Builder spawnCustomizer(SpawnCustomizer spawnCustomizer)
        Sets an executor which will be called every time the NPC is spawned for a certain player. Permanent NPC modifications should be done in this method, otherwise they will be lost at the next respawn of the NPC.
        Parameters:
        spawnCustomizer - the spawn customizer which will be called on every spawn
        Returns:
        this builder instance

      • build

        public NPC build(NPCPool pool)
        Passes the NPC to a pool which handles events, spawning and destruction of this NPC for players
        Parameters:
        pool - the pool the NPC will be passed to
        Returns:
        this builder instance
